data.title: Celebrity Theatres
data.text:
Celebrity Theatres - Baton Rouge 10

For years Celebrity Theatres has been committed to providing the best in total family entertainment to the Baton Rouge and surrounding area. With our superior customer service and state of the art technology, we pride ourselves in offering a safe, fun and affordable entertainment experience for the entire family. Whether it be our invigorating arcade, newly added bar or theaters featuring oversized, leather reclining seats and Dolby Atmos sound systems, there is truly an attraction for everyone. For more information on movies, movie times or to purchase your tickets in advance, please visit www.celebritytheatres.com, or for information about large groups and parties, please email events@celebritytheatres.com. Thank you for your patronage - see you at the movies!
